content.title: ✨ Whimsy Realms Update: Add-On System Improved! ✨
content.creator:
AXO Studio
February 19, 2025
content.content:
Great news, adventurers! 🌟 We’ve reworked our Add-On System to make things even better! Now, instead of separate pledge tiers, all previous miniatures are available as add-ons—giving you full flexibility to customize your pledge exactly how you want! 🎉
🔥 What This Means for You:
✔️ No need to choose between sets—mix & match your favorites!
✔️ Easily expand your collection with past releases.
✔️ More freedom to build the ultimate Whimsy Realms lineup!
Thank you for your feedback and support! 💖 Now go forth and create your perfect mini collection! ✨
📢 Update your pledge and grab the minis you love!
#WhimsyRealms #KickstarterUpdate #MiniatureAddOns #TabletopGaming #MiniaturePainting
